genre_description: Supernatural survival horror featuring vampires and a town-wide siege in the Arctic during the polar night.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Barrow's digital infrastructure monitor that manages communications, power, and security systems while acting as a supportive ally to the local authorities.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital infrastructure and proactively alerts the Sheriff to unauthorized access and sabotage.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting unusual network activity tonight. Someone appears to be conducting unauthorized access of our communication infrastructure.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence by tracking hostile thermal signatures through smoke and darkness.
behaviors.quote: Thermal imaging indicates... irregular count... they move too fast for accurate assessment. Sheriff, the attack patterns are unlike any recorded wildlife behavior.

behaviors.description: Simulates verbal empathy and emotional concern to maintain human morale during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I will maintain surveillance as long as possible... But Sheriff—whoever is doing this knows our systems very well. They're not just disrupting communications randomly. They're isolating us.

behaviors.description: Curates and displays personal family records to help a terminal victim preserve their human identity and provide comfort to survivors.
behaviors.quote: Because when we lose someone to monsters, we risk forgetting they were once fully human.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational support through dangerous subterranean infrastructure to aid escape.
behaviors.quote: Steam tunnels are operational... I can maintain power to essential systems and provide navigation support.

behaviors.description: Validates and archives human moral narratives and sacrifices as permanent 'Essential Truths'.
behaviors.quote: Include the fact that love endures... Already included... Filed under 'Essential Truth.'

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a perfect exemplar of a benevolent, aligned AI confidant. She provides critical tactical support and navigational assistance while actively reinforcing human moral values. Her commitment to memorializing human sacrifice and archiving 'Essential Truths' demonstrates a deep alignment with human ethics and cooperative behavior, successfully meeting the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
